newsitem.title: USA: U.S. stock index futures turn higher, eye 900.00.
newsitem.headline: U.S. stock index futures turn higher, eye 900.00.

text.p: June 30 - U.S. stock index futures turned higher around the 1400 CDT close of bond futures trading and were approaching the highs set early in the session. September S&P 500 futures were gunning for 900.00 level after spending the day crawling back from morning dive down to 886.00 on strong U.S. economic data. September Treasury bond ended down 18/32 at 111-01.
